mapper.select: SELECT r.r_num, r.u_member_id, r.pd_id, r.r_score, r.r_content, r.r_img, r.r_regDate AS r_regDate, r.r_like_cnt, u.u_nickname AS u_nickname FROM review_tbl r LEFT JOIN user_tbl u ON u.u_member_id = r.u_member_id WHERE r.r_num = #{r_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review_tbl ( r_num, u_member_id, pd_id, r_content, r_score, r_img, r_regDate, r_like_cnt ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(r_num)+1, 1) FROM review_tbl), #{u_member_id}, #{pd_id}, #{r_content}, #{r_score}, null, SYSDATE, 0 )
